description: Required facts for each eviction ground and document type

landlord_previous_residence.question: Did you (the landlord) live in this property as your main home before the tenancy started?

notice_given_before_tenancy.question: Did you give the tenant written notice before/at the start of the tenancy that you might seek possession under Ground 1?

landlord_now_needs_property.question: Do you now need to move back into the property as your main home?

statement_material.description: Did this false statement influence your decision to grant the tenancy?

reason_for_eviction.note: Not required for Section 21, but helpful for records
